tool_description: All you need to create a traditional / non traditional Braille display system.  If you have a braille display / want to mimic one in the browser or in your app this is the API you will integrate with.  This takes plain English text and converts to various forms of braille (unicode/ braille/ image etc) display styles.
title: Braille Translator

api_list.name: Braille Image
api_list.description: Get braille text as html images.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: English text to convert to Braille html image.
required_parameters.default: Hi, I am from Mars and I speak Braille.

api_list.name: Braille
api_list.description: Convert English text to text suitable for traditional braille display.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: English text to convert to Braille
required_parameters.default: Hi, I am from Mars and I speak Braille.

api_list.name: Braille Dots
api_list.description: Gets the dots info(which dots are on and which are off) for the equivalent braille text for a given text.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: English text to convert to braille dots.
required_parameters.default: Hi, I am from Mars and I speak Braille.

api_list.name: Braille HTML
api_list.description: Get equivalen braille characters  for a given English text as html unicode characters.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: English text to convert to Unicode html
required_parameters.default: Hi, I am from Mars and I speak Braille.

api_list.name: Braille Unicode
api_list.description: Get the braille text as unicode characters to display in browser or an APP capable of displaying unicode.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: English text to convert to braille unicode.
required_parameters.default: Hi, I am from Mars and I speak Braille.
